globalProperty.value: select concat(r.given_name,' ', r.family_name) as name, r.identifier as identifier, concat("", r.uuid) as uuid, null as activeVisitUuid, null as hasBeenAdmitted, date(r.value) as encodedUntil, (select date(o_fu.obs_datetime) from obs o_fu inner join concept_name cn_fu on cn_fu.concept_id = o_fu.concept_id and cn_fu.voided = 0 where o_fu.voided = 0 and o_fu.person_id = r.person_id and cn_fu.concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" and cn_fu.name = "forms.assessment" and not exists (select 1 from obs o2_fu where o2_fu.concept_id = o_fu.concept_id and o2_fu.person_id = o_fu.person_id and o2_fu.obs_datetime > o_fu.obs_datetime and o2_fu.voided = 0) ) as assessment_date, (select date(o_fu.obs_datetime) from obs o_fu inner join concept_name cn_fu on cn_fu.concept_id = o_fu.concept_id and cn_fu.voided = 0 where o_fu.voided = 0 and o_fu.person_id = r.person_id and cn_fu.concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" and cn_fu.name = "forms.follow_up" and not exists (select 1 from obs o2_fu where o2_fu.concept_id = o_fu.concept_id and o2_fu.person_id = o_fu.person_id and o2_fu.obs_datetime > o_fu.obs_datetime and o2_fu.voided = 0) ) as last_follow_up_date, (select date(o_fu.obs_datetime) from obs o_fu inner join concept_name cn_fu on cn_fu.concept_id = o_fu.concept_id and cn_fu.voided = 0 where o_fu.voided = 0 and o_fu.person_id = r.person_id and cn_fu.concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" and cn_fu.name = "forms.discharge" and not exists (select 1 from obs o2_fu where o2_fu.concept_id = o_fu.concept_id and o2_fu.person_id = o_fu.person_id and o2_fu.obs_datetime > o_fu.obs_datetime and o2_fu.voided = 0) ) as discharge_recorded_date from (select pn.given_name, pn.family_name, pi.identifier, p.person_id, p.uuid, pa.value from person p inner join person_name pn on pn.person_id = p.person_id and pn.voided = 0 inner join patient_identifier pi on pi.patient_id = p.person_id and pi.voided = 0 inner join person_attribute pa on pa.person_id = p.person_id and pa.voided = 0 where p.voided = 0 and pa.person_attribute_type_id = (select pat.person_attribute_type_id from person_attribute_type pat where pat.name = "reg.encodedUntil" and pat.retired = 0) and exists (select 1 from obs o inner join concept_name cn on cn.concept_id = o.concept_id and cn.voided = 0 where o.voided = 0 and o.person_id = p.person_id and cn.name in ("forms.follow_up", "forms.discharge", "forms.assessment") and cn.concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" and date(pa.value) < date(o.obs_datetime) and o.obs_datetime > date_sub(curdate(), interval 60 day)) union select pn.given_name, pn.family_name, pi.identifier, p.person_id, p.uuid, null as value from person p inner join person_name pn on pn.person_id = p.person_id and pn.voided = 0 inner join patient_identifier pi on pi.patient_id = p.person_id and pi.voided = 0 where p.voided = 0 and exists (select 1 from obs o inner join concept_name cn on cn.concept_id = o.concept_id and cn.voided = 0 where o.voided = 0 and o.person_id = p.person_id and cn.name in ("forms.follow_up", "forms.discharge", "forms.assessment") and cn.concept_name_type = "FULLY_SPECIFIED" and o.obs_datetime > date_sub(curdate(), interval 60 day)) and not exists (select 1 from person_attribute pa where pa.person_id = p.person_id and pa.voided = 0 and person_attribute_type_id = (select pat.person_attribute_type_id from person_attribute_type pat where pat.name = "reg.encodedUntil" and pat.retired = 0)) ) as r;
